entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
